technology: There were no technical difficulties experienced by the participant.
cur_neg_affect: The participant did not express any negative affect about the pandemic/masks/vaccine/boosters in the present.
past_neg_affect: The participant expressed some negative affect about missing out on experiences during the pandemic.
communal_orientation: The participant was engaged in the conversation and asked questions, but did not give affirmations or seem entirely engaged.
engagement: The participant was engaged in the conversation and tried to keep it going.
defensiveness: The participant was not at all defensive in justifying their beliefs/perspective.
vaccine_importance: Vaccine importance was not discussed at the end of the conversation.
booster_importance: Booster importance was not discussed at the end of the conversation.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrated a moderate amount of cognitive complexity by considering different perspectives and recognizing nuance.
general_notes: The participant seemed to have a positive experience during the pandemic.
